title: I want PIZZA!
name: I want PIZZA!
description:
A Map by Znash

Favorite ten spots to eat some Pizza.

properties.name: Barleys taproom and pizzeria
properties.description: Posted by Znash200 E Jackson AVE Knoxville, TnPizza\'s and Calzone to die for. Usually live bands 4 to 5 nights of the week. Awesome place to just go hang out and eat some good food and drink some good beer

properties.name: Big Ed's Pizza
properties.description: Posted by Znash101 Broadway Ave Oak Ridge, TnYou may have seen the famous Big Ed\'s Tshirt with Big Ed on it. Well Big Ed\'s has been around for many years and if you like some good ol\' greasy extra cheesy pizza this is the place. I love getting more than I can eat, just so I can have Leftovers!

properties.name: Da Vinci's Pizzeria and Calzones
properties.description: Posted by Znash113 S central st. knoxville tnThis restaurant sits in the heart of the Old City in Knoxville and has some large slices of excellent pizza to eat on. It is in walking distance from many bars and clubs. It is an a Very attractive area for people to who like to go out and eat some pizza and go to a few bars and maybe hear a band or two.

properties.name: Hungry Howie's pizza and subs
properties.description: Posted by Znash4550 Chapman Highway Knoxville, TnGreat Pizza at a convienent location.

properties.name: Mangia's Pizza and more
properties.description: Posted by Znash10926 parkside dr knoxville tnNew location of all different kinds of store surround this pizza palace. Free breadsticks(Covered with parmesan cheese and garlic),free refills and some of the best pizza I have had. It is a perfect place to go eat before possibly going to catch a flick at the new Pinnacle movie Theatre right down the road.

properties.name: Mellow Mushroom
properties.description: Posted by Znash2109 Cumberland Ave, Knoxville, TNVery chill restaurant to possibly take your family or go out with some guys and watch a football game. They use fresh veggies on their pizza which keeps it a little more healthy and adds that fresh taste. Awesome designs and mushrooms all over the place in there....Hippie Heaven.

properties.name: Mr. Gatti's
properties.description: Posted by Znash6909 Kingston Pike Knoxville TnSix dollars and change for an all you can eat Buffet of all different kinds of pizza, why not?

properties.name: Stefano's Chicago style Pizza
properties.description: Posted by Znash1937 Cumberland Avenue knoxville tennesseeAnother good location....its on the main strip right through the University of Tennessee. Go drink a beer and eat some Chicago style pizza!

properties.name: Tomato Head
properties.description: Posted by Znash12 Market Square Knoxville, TNAwesome location for a restaurant, right in the middle of Market Square\'s beautiful atmosphere. Indoor and outdoor eating avaiable. Nothing better than eating incredible pizza with some good wine outside in market square.

properties.name: little Caesars pizza
properties.description: Posted by Znash7335 Chapman Highway Knoxville TnOn your way home and want to pick up a quick pizza? Stop by little Caesars and pick up a hot and ready .00 pizza.
